titleStmt.title: Plantagenets tragicall story or, The death of King Edward the Fourth: with the unnaturall voyage of Richard the Third, through the Red Sea of his nephews innocent bloud, to his usurped crowne. Metaphrased by T.W. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Wincoll, Thomas, d. 1675.
T. W. (Thomas Weaver), 1616-1663, attributed name.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for Richard Tomlins at the Sun and Bible neer Pie-corner,

notesStmt.note: T.W. = Thomas Wincoll. Sometimes attributed to Thomas Weaver.
The portrait of the author is signed: W.M. fecit., i.e. William Marshall.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
